https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/35kj7gvkatXuzD63sfmsVW7H6Zk.jpg A group of history students are promised a reward if they can find the ancient tools of legendary blacksmith, 'One-Eyed Yardley', who murdered the townspeople of a remote rustic village in the 1800s. Legend says his ghost still stalks these haunted grounds... Bloody Blacksmith
